description:
Just because you aren't able to spend every day on the trail doesn't mean you can't pretend that's where you are. Lace up the Chaco Fields Boot to bring a little trail style to your everyday wardrobe. With a tucked-in pair of jeans and a cozy fleece you'll have that off-duty thru-hiker look dialed plus plenty of traction for whatever Mother Nature throws your way.

A full-grain leather upper promises to mold to your foot over time while Chaco's renowned Luvseat footbed and a springy EVA midsole support your foot through long days of errands. The non-marking skid-resistant rubber sole and its capable tread give you plenty of stability when you head off-road even if it's just for a quick lunchtime walk through the park.
name: Chaco Fields Lace - Mens
